entities.name: penelope
entities.description: Penelope is a member of the Gryffindor team. She is mentioned as 'Penny' by Percy.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a member of the Gryffindor team and is on the Quidditch match.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is a member of the Gryffindor team. He is mentioned as being in urgent need of Harry to win the match.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy is a Slytherin student who arrives for a closer look at the Firebolt broomstick.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is a member of the Slytherin team and is mentioned as being present with Goyle.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is a member of the Slytherin team and is mentioned as being present with Crabbe.

relationships.description: Harry has a bet with Penelope on the outcome of the match.
Percy depends on Harry to win the match so that he can pay off his debt.
